hero.title: Selling the Vision,
hero.subtitle: Giving buyers the ‘Try before you buy’ experience of your properties, VR can help you turn your properties into immersive experiences, engage with visitors inside VR, and get real-time data insights.

features.title: Take clients on a virtual journey of your properties
features.desc: Increase your sales turnover time by marketing commercial properties even before they're built. With Virtual Walkthrough realtors can take clients on a virtual journey of their properties, from the comfort of their home, anywhere, anytime.

features.title: Get multi-functional insights
features.desc: Get 100% data of visitors inside virtual reality walkthroughs of the properties. With VR Analytics, you can get actionable insights on top-selling properties and location performance.

features.title: Increase engagement with AI Talkbot
features.desc: Engage visitors in a virtual walkthrough of your properties with AI-enabled Talkbot and create the ultimate customer experience. With an AI Talkbot, you can provide customer service anywhere, 24x7x365.

features.title: Value realization
features.desc: Turn your ideas into reality with 3D 360 rendering of your projects. With our 3D rendering software, you can create a down to the details, scalable design of your project, and make your wildest imagination come true.

features.title: Harness the power of creation
features.desc: Let clients experience both the digital and physical qualities of your project by designing holographic displays of your properties. With Melzo's VR technology you can create next-generation showcases that help you promote your brand.

features.title: Virtual sales tool
features.desc: Interact with customers inside a virtual tour of your projects. Melzo's VR system lets you communicate to your customers via audio and video conferences while they're in a VR experience of your properties.

items.benefit: Eliminate the cost of physical sample flats. A single VR setup replaces dozens of model units, speeding up ROI on large-scale projects.
Get clients to approve designs faster with 100% clarity. No more "I thought it would be bigger" after construction starts.
Close deals in a competitive market with an experience that competitors can't match. Be the agent with the future-tech advantage.

salesGallery.title: The Future-Proof Sales Gallery.
salesGallery.subtitle: A Melzo VR setup transforms a standard sales office into a high-tech destination. Position your brand as a market leader with an experience that buyers remember—and talk about.

items.title: Premium Positioning
items.desc: Stand out in a crowded market with technology that screams innovation and quality.

items.title: Faster Decision Cycles
items.desc: Reduce the time from first viewing to contract signing by eliminating uncertainty.

items.title: Luxury Brand Appeal
items.desc: Attract high-net-worth buyers who expect cutting-edge experiences in every interaction.
